Rulings.Edison:
●Since Mystical Space Typhoon can't destroy itself, when you chain Fiend's Hand Mirror to your opponent's Mystical Space Typhoon, you can't re-direct the Mystical Space Typhoon to target itself. But you can re-direct it to target and destroy Fiend's Hand Mirror.
●When your opponent activates Mystical Space Typhoon to destroy his/her Mirage of Nightmare, you can chain Fiend's Hand Mirror and have Mystical Space Typhoon destroy Fiend's Hand Mirror instead.

Rulings.Base: 1. Since "Mystical Space Typhoon" cannot destroy itself, when you chain "Fiend's Hand Mirror" to your opponent's "Mystical Space Typhoon", you cannot re-direct the "Mystical Space Typhoon" to target itself. But you can re-direct it to target and destroy "Fiend's Hand Mirror".\n2. When your opponent activates "Mystical Space Typhoon" to destroy his/her "Mirage of Nightmare", you can chain "Fiend's Hand Mirror" and have "Mystical Space Typhoon" destroy "Fiend's Hand Mirror" instead.
